attributes.action: In light of thw 400+ British traitors and internal  growing UK Jihad activist. Treason against the Crown and its people should carry the death penalty
attributes.additional_details: Due to the recent events and in light of thw 400+ British traitors and internal growing UK Jihad activists & future dangers to the Crown & its people. The 400+ British defecters have entry back Britain and the UK have no exit controls in place either and situation will not get better with threts, future converts, future wars on terror, against our way of life and to the Christain Monarch state we live in . Due to the human rights bill, there have been massive loop holes. We as a country can't sit and watch anymore and people need to realise if you commit treason against this country & its people it carry's the death penalty without appeal. This petition requests the goverment disscuss this as our times have changed 10 fold in the last 15-20 years. we need to man up and wise up. Bring back the death penalty for treason.
